document_data.name: Felucca
document_data.mainbody: A '''felucca''' was a small sailing vessel used mainly in [[Rashemen]]. They were also used by fishermen in [[Amn]].
document_data.Description: These small ships had two masts, which were [[lateen]] style.
document_data.History: These ships were usually operated by a crew of six and could carry up to {{SI|70000|lb|k|long=yes}} of cargo.
